alert.note: Alert for Atkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 10:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Atkinson County through 1115 PM EDT... At 1032 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Nashville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph, half inch hail, and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Willacoochee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
